animeDescription: Danpei Ichihgeki is the son of Daijurou Ichigeki, a great dodgeball player. As his father, Danpei gives all he has for this game and so it shows in every match.  (Source: AnimeNfo)
animeCharacters: ['Danpei, Ichigeki', 'Kobotoke, Chinnen', 'Rikuo, Touma', 'Mido, Arashi', 'Toudou, Misato', 'Kuroiwa, Tatsuya']
